CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1946, pg. 2, reads: "Coach Gives Lecture - Peter Dimperio, coach at Herron Hill Junior High School, who will be the speaker at Centre Avenue YMCA's Health Forum next Wednesday evening. He will lecture the fellows on his basketball team.  Mr. Dimperio will discuss 'The Danger Age' at the forum. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Herron Hill Junior High School football coach Peter "Pete" Dimperio, pointing to three boys and man, in office with Mellon bank calendar and notice about soccer practice posted on the wall
